channel.title: Articles about ActivityPub
channel.description:
Hello everyone,
I searched a bit where to post this as everything seemed to be only developers related, so I hope my intervention will not bother to much, I didn't really find anywhere to post this, so maybe here... For the purpose of a possible article about decentralised software community organisation, I have been looking for academic writings about activity pub and did not immediately find anything, I thought here could be a good place to ask if anyone knew of recent publications, either technical or not, but specifically about activity pub implementations.

item.title: Articles about ActivityPub
item.dc:creator: Sebastian
item.description:
cool.
Another recent paper was https://github.com/WebOfTrustInfo/rwot9-prague/blob/2b378010c46b3250c6612d075fd6577a8275fb8a/topics-and-advance-readings/ap-unwanted-messages.md
I can also very much recommend to listen https://librelounge.org

Read full topic

item.title: Articles about ActivityPub
item.dc:creator: natacha
item.description:
thx @Sebastian indeed there is a lot of references in the web of trust repository not really sure how it relates to this community but I’ll feed back on it.

Read full topic

item.title: Articles about ActivityPub
item.dc:creator: Sebastian
item.description:
I refer to “academic writings” first.
I guess most of them are published within the various “Rebooting Web Of Trust” repositories on github.

GitHub

Web of Trust Info

Shared repositories for #RebootingWebOfTrust Design Workshops - Web of Trust Info


Also I’d like to point to the recent work of the co-creator of AP :
e.g. https://gitlab.com/spritely/ocappub

Read full topic
